title: An Inside Look at Libra Sun Aries Moon

steps.title: Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals are caring and adventurous souls.
steps.content: Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals are caring and adventurous souls. As Libra Suns, they were born sometime between September 23 and October 22; as Aries Moons, the Moon fell under the Aries constellation at the exact moment of their birth. Astrologically speaking, Sun signs speak to a person’s core personality, while Moon signs speak to the hidden, emotional side of an individual. So, it makes sense that these individuals embody the friendly, peace-loving spirit of a Libra up front as well as the restless, instigating spirit of an Aries beneath the surface. Sun in Libra traits: Harmonious, intellectual, friendly, cooperative [1] X Research source Moon in Aries traits : Impulsive, independent, restless, straightforward [2] X Research source Libra and Aries are both cardinal signs, or signs that begin a specific season (autumn and spring, respectively). These signs are well-known for their sense of leadership, and you can often find them at the head of the pack. [3] X Research source To determine your Moon sign , you need to know your date, time, and place of birth. You can calculate this by checking an ephemeris, consulting an astrologer, or using an online calculator . Did You Know? Cardi B, Kamala Harris, T-Pain, and Thom York are all Libra Suns and Aries Moons.

steps.title: Amicable
steps.content: Amicable True to their Libra core, this sun-moon combo really values harmony, and has no trouble hitting it off with the people around them. Friendly, fun, and positive to a fault, it’s no surprise that these individuals are often surrounded by friends.

steps.title: Adventurous
steps.content: Adventurous Eternally restless, a Libra Sun and Aries Moon has a hard time sitting still and watching the world go by. They’re much happier and content when they’re embarking on a new adventure and exploring everything that life has to offer. If this astrological profile came with a motto, it would probably be variety is the spice of life .

steps.title: Open
steps.content: Open No one ever has to guess what’s on this sign’s mind—chances are, they’ll share it! A typical Libra Sun and Aries Moon doesn’t like to beat around the bush, and is quick to explain how they’re feeling at any given time.

steps.title: Mercurial
steps.content: Mercurial Libra Suns are innately peaceful, while Aries Moons tend to be impulsive and restless. With these conflicting natures, Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals tend to see-saw between different emotions and desires like optimism and pessimism, openness and restraint, and contentment and dissatisfaction.

steps.title: Rebellious
steps.content: Rebellious To a Libra Sun and Aries Moon individual, following (and accepting) the mainstream is a big no-no. Instead, they find a sense of pride in doing the unexpected or taking the less-preferred path. (Remember the hipster trend?) [4] X Research source

steps.title: Mischievous
steps.content: Mischievous As much as Libras love peace and harmony, a Libra Sun and Aries Moon individual isn’t afraid to goof and mess around with the people in their life. Guided by the restless Aries within, they love to be playful (and maybe even a little devilish) if the situation calls for it.

steps.title: Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals get along swimmingly with everyone.
steps.content: Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals get along swimmingly with everyone. As Libras, they try to keep the peace as much as possible and prevent making waves. [5] X Research source This harmonious, friendly nature makes it easy for them to make friends—in fact, don’t be surprised if they have a wide social circle!

steps.title: They’re dedicated and enthusiastic about their goals.
steps.content: They’re dedicated and enthusiastic about their goals. Libra Sun Aries Moon individuals are like a dog with a bone—once they get their mind set on something, it’s all they can think about. Flexible and willing to learn, this sun-moon dynamo is more than willing to learn new skills on their path to success. Tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: It’s great that you’re so passionate, but make sure that you aren’t overcommitting yourself! You’ll have a harder time achieving your goals if you spread yourself too thin.

steps.title: They aren’t afraid to be their own person.
steps.content: They aren’t afraid to be their own person. Although Libra Sun Aries Moons are very in tune with how other people view them, they don’t lose any sleep over the opinions of others. If anything, this sun-moon combo goes the extra mile to go against the grain and choose the option that nobody else is going for. [6] X Research source Tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: While it can be fun to go against what other people are doing, try not to be contradictory for the sake of being contradictory. Instead, try to channel your inner Libra and go with the flow once in a while.

steps.title: A Libra Sun and Aries Moon often struggles with contradictory desires.
steps.content: A Libra Sun and Aries Moon often struggles with contradictory desires. Ruled by their patron scale, Libra Suns are often defined by their love of harmony and balance. [7] X Research source Aries Moons, on the other hand, are passionate trailblazers who aren’t afraid to stray off the beaten path. [8] X Research source People with this sun-moon combo might have trouble balancing their peaceful nature with their bold and restless inner desires. Tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: Look for opportunities where you can let your bold, passionate energy shine through. Trying out a new hobby, volunteering, or championing a cause that you care about are all great options!

steps.title: They tend to live with their head in the clouds.
steps.content: They tend to live with their head in the clouds. Sometimes, Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals get tired of the boring constraints that define their reality and prefer to spend time frolicking in their imagination. While there’s nothing wrong with taking a break from the real world once in a while, this sun-moon duo might need a reminder to stay grounded. Tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: Set aside plenty of time in your social calendar to hang out with friends and loved ones—that’s an easy way to keep yourself rooted in reality.

steps.title: They aren’t the best at sitting back and relaxing.
steps.content: They aren’t the best at sitting back and relaxing. This sun-moon combo truly embodies the philosophy of an object in motion staying in motion. The idea of sitting still never crosses their mind; whether it’s a casual conversation or an afternoon out at the park, Libra Sun and Aries Moon peeps are always angling to keep things interesting. Tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: Try practicing mindfulness in your spare time! This helps you ground yourself in the present as you learn to appreciate and accept whatever’s happening in that exact moment. [9] X Trustworthy Source HelpGuide Nonprofit organization dedicated to providing free, evidence-based mental health and wellness resources. Go to source

steps.title: Libra Suns Aries Moons need a partner who loves them unconditionally.
steps.content: Libra Suns Aries Moons need a partner who loves them unconditionally. For better or for worse, this sun-moon combo is unapologetically themselves—while they’re friendly and supportive, they’re often filled with a restless energy that’s hard to keep up with. An ideal partner is willing to meet a Libra Sun Aries Moon halfway, and accept them without any strings attached. [10] X Research source Compatibility tip for a Libra Sun and Aries Moon: Libra Suns are especially compatible with Aquarius Suns, Gemini Suns, and fellow Libra Suns. [11] X Research source Aries Moons are particularly compatible with Leo Moons , Sagittarius Moons , and fellow Aries Moons. [12] X Research source Someone with this combination of signs in their star chart could be a good match for you!

steps.title: This dynamic sun-moon combo needs to be on equal footing with their partner.
steps.content: This dynamic sun-moon combo needs to be on equal footing with their partner. Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals aren’t a fan of letting their partner take the wheel—they want a say in every aspect of their relationship. If they feel like their partner isn’t listening to or acknowledging them, they might start to pull away. Communication is an essential part of any successful relationship. Thankfully, Libra Sun Aries Moon individuals are very transparent about how they’re feeling, and don’t like keeping their emotions buried beneath the surface.

steps.title: Libra Sun and Aries Moons need to stay in touch with their SO.
steps.content: Libra Sun and Aries Moons need to stay in touch with their SO. This sun-moon combo isn’t the type of person who can go a couple days without texting their partner. In order to feel happy and fulfilled, Libra Sun and Aries Moon individuals need to spend lots of time with their SO. [13] X Research source This individual might enjoy applying regular rituals to their relationship, like daily “good morning” texts and weekly date nights.

steps.title: The independent Libra Sun Aries Moon woman likes to stay on the move.
steps.content: The independent Libra Sun Aries Moon woman likes to stay on the move. Despite her Libra Sun sign, this vibrant and passionate lady typically knows exactly what she wants (and isn’t afraid to ask for it). She loves the concept of romance and enjoys being in love—and yet, she struggles a bit with putting down roots in her long-term partnerships. A little bit of compromise can go a long way if you’d like to take your relationship with her to the next level. Strengths: She lives life with passion and isn’t afraid to chase after exactly what she desires. Weaknesses: She’s not always the best at compromising, and may struggle to hand the reins over to someone else (especially her romantic partner).

steps.title: The magnetic Libra Sun and Aries Moon man lives life with a sense of adventure.
steps.content: The magnetic Libra Sun and Aries Moon man lives life with a sense of adventure. Charismatic and alluring, it’s no surprise that this guy can charm his way into another person’s orbit. Still, a Libra Sun and Aries Moon only likes to hang around for a good time, not a long time. Patience and persistence are both key if you want to put a ring on this restless sun-moon combo! Strengths: He’s always down to have some fun—you’ll definitely have a blast as long as a Libra Sun and Aries Moon man is around! Weaknesses: He’s not crazy about commitment; if you’re hoping to settle down with him, you’ll have to be patient.
